nodes.text: Arslynd was an individual who was present at Tansarii Point Station around 1 ABY. Arslynd was killed by a spacer, who was training to become a bounty hunter, hired by Boba Fett. The spacer found the bounty hiding in the station's atrium with a bodyguard.

Arslynd is a NPC in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Arslynd is found in the tutorial level on Tansarii point station added by the NGE update and is killed by any player who took the Bounty hunter proffesion as part of a non-optional profession quest for Boba Fett. Arslynd's species and gender would be randomized each time he spawned. Some potential appearances included being a male or female Rodian, or a female Bothan. However, the quest dialogue established him as a male.
